price: ហើយបើធ្វើដូច្នោះ យើងពិតជានឹងផ្តល់ឱ្យពួកគេនូវផល បុណ្យដ៏ធំធេងពីយើង។
arabic: وَإِذٗا لَّأٓتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhan laātaynāhum min ladunnā ajran ʿaẓīman
